column5: Just heard Leonard Nimoy passed away.  RIP Spock
That's sad, he was always one of my fav Star Trek actors.
That's sad, he was always one of my fav Star Trek actors. x2 RIP Spock
Vulcan salutes for the rest of the day.
He was the best character on Star Trek hands down.
Can't imagine anyone else doing the role of Spock. He absolutely nailed it.  Sad day indeed.  LLP Mr Spock.
Yep, a sad day indeed. Rip leonard nimoy
A very talented actor.  Dragging around an anchor like Shatner  didn't help his career either.
Yes ,heard this on the way home tonight. One of a kind.  RIP
Loved his role as well, but a young Kirk (tiberius) what a pair,sure hard to beat.What a great tandem!!!!!!RIP Mr Spock!!!!!!We'll all miss you!!
He was a good guy. I bet he got beamed up, not down!!
RIP and LLAP  Just a little something fun to remember him by   https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AGF5ROpjRAU  Enjoy  Kawartha Kev
